items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
				<jats:p>The article presents the results of experimental research, which is to show a correlation between the change of operating status of single IGBT transistor and its acoustic emission. Sensor signal was obtained with oscilloscope in order to further process it digitally and determine possibility of the damage to the element based on registered acoustic signal.</jats:p>
title: Detection and Recording of Acoustic Emission in Discrete IGBT Transistors

Acta Crystallogr E Struct Rep Online
Acta Crystallogr Sect E Struct Rep Online
Acta Cryst E Struct Rep Online
items.abstract: <jats:p>The absolute configuration of the title compound, C<jats:sub>24</jats:sub>H<jats:sub>23</jats:sub>NO<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>, has been confirmed as 3<jats:italic>R</jats:italic>,4<jats:italic>R</jats:italic>. The hydroxymethyl group and phenyl ring at the asymmetric C atoms exhibit α and β orientations, respectively, and the non-planar heterocyclic ring of the tetrahydroisoquinoline system adopts an envelope conformation. The crystal structure is stabilized through hydrogen bonds.</jats:p>
title: (3R,4R)-(–)-3-Hydroxymethyl-4-phenyl-2-o-toluoyl-1,2,3,4-tetrahydroisoquinoline
